name: Silvia Domcke
bio: Silvia is an Assistant Professor at the University of Zurich. Her scientific journey took her to the Technical University of Munich, Harvard Medical School in Boston, Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center in New York, the FMI in Basel, and the University of Washington in Seattle. From bench to byte, she has worked on all aspects of single cell genomics, including leading a computational team at a Silicon Valley drug discovery start-up.
extra: Silvia's love for exploring the unknown goes beyond the cellular landscape: she's also a passionate ski mountaineer, alpine climber and wilderness adventurer.
